snippet: BTC China, the country’s biggest Bitcoin exchange, stopped taking deposits in the Chinese currency, sending the price of Bitcoins tumbling in one of its biggest markets globally.
lead_paragraph: BTC China, the country’s biggest Bitcoin exchange, stopped taking deposits in the Chinese currency, sending the price of Bitcoins tumbling in one of its biggest markets globally.

headline.main: Bitcoin Value Sinks After Chinese Exchange Move
headline.print_headline: Bitcoin Value Sinks After Chinese Exchange Move
